Shorts made of cotton yarn. High-waisted with elastic back waistband. Front pleats. Tone-on-tone embroidery detail. Concealed zip closure.

structuredData.name: PRINTED HOODIE
structuredData.description:
Relaxed fit hoodie. Adjustable hood and long sleeves. Kangaroo pocket. Contrasting printed graphics on front and sleeve. Washed effect. Ribbed trim.

This garment has a unique appearance thanks to its special washing process. For this reason, the color may differ slightly from the photo.

structuredData.name: TEXT QUARTER ZIP SWEATSHIRT
structuredData.description:
Relaxed fit sweatshirt made of cotton with brushed interior. High collar with front zip closure. Contrasting front and back prints. Rib trim.

The item has a unique look due to its special washing process. For this reason, the color may differ slightly from that seen in the photo.

structuredData.name: NYLON CROSSBODY BAG
structuredData.description:
Crossbody bag made of technical fabric. Main compartment with zip closure. Has a flat interior pocket with zip closure. Front flap pocket and quick-release buckle closure. Removable coin purse. Removable and adjustable shoulder strap. 

Height x Length x Width: 5.5 x 7.9 x 2.4 inches (14 x 20 x 6 cm)
